welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heerlerbaan, where the charm of the Netherlands awaits you! Explore our beautiful city known for its picturesque landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Heerlerbaan has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Maastricht/aachen Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo operations at Maastricht/aachen Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: Dedicated terminal for cargo operations at Liege Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
